this game feels as good as the some of the trailers say it is it feels nostalgic it puzzles your brain to make you think and rewords you with some quirky voice lines  betrayals and victory  the coop is fun and the story deserves to have more every time i see this game in my library i have memory of good times just flood back into me and sometimes i replay it just for the moments

I am glad that Valve is not a prolific developer. While their graphics and physics are generally ahead of their time, The bleak story lines and acrid sense of humor is wholly unwelcome as far as I'm concerned. I wish there were more non-Satanic non-Free Masonic game developers out there.
Played this game before but redownloaded recently and it has stood the test of time. Great puzzles, narrative, and dialogue. 10/10

Takže vy ste Testovný subejct menom Chell zobudíťe sa je to normálne ale potom sa zobudíťe o 99999.. dní neskôr kvôli tomu že ratman bol zasiahnutý turretov a predĺžíl vám umelý spánok zobudíte sa a vám zaklope taký pekný robot menom Wheatley ten vás bude pomaly sprevádzať pár úrovanmi v hre ale potom pri predposlednej test chamber vás najde wheatley a ste na úteku potom ovládne Aperture sciene facitly a vás s Zemiakom Glados pošle do starých končín aperture science tam po úrovniach si vypočujeťe náhravky Cave Johnsna (Majtelom Aperture science) spoznáte nové gely napr skákací gel, portálovatelný gel, rýchlostní gel a glados spozná hlas Caroline a keď nájdete obraz Cave Johnsna a Caroline povie "Týto ludia na obrazu sú mi povedomí"(Caroline je Glados)  potom sa dostaneťe so starej Aperture Scienece tak si prejdete pár úrovnami a potom vás čaká boss fight s Wheatlym a vy ho pošleťe do vesmíru takže

Это будет самая лучшая игра, которую я проходил когда-либо. Она мне нравится всем: и игровой механикой, а особенно сюжетом. Обязательно рекомендуется тем, кто с этой игрой мало знаком или вовсе её не знает. Этот комментарий написан с большой радостью и надеждой, что выйдет продолжение моей новой любимой игры - Portal!
I have been falling for 30 minutes
super fun , wish there were more multiplayer levels to keep on playing
Very good gameplay, good graphics, almost no bugs and a good community. Everything a masterpiece needs and deserves.

Very good game design with puzzles that are just shy of being too hard, but at the same time being so engaging. One of the best voiceovers ever done, with the main "robot" sphere feeling like an actual person.

Игруха топ за свои деньги. Поддерживает ремоут плей, что позволяет играть с другом который не покупал Portal 2. Можно здорово пофаниться с друзьями и провести вечера. Минус один, это сложность головоломок

只通了单人。对比一代场景大了很多，但干扰因素也多了。很多时候不是在解谜，而是在找墙。有很多渲染气氛的超大场景，谜题却很简单。个人更喜欢一代，不过都是值得推荐的好游戏。

Extremely intelligent game, clever riddles, awesome graphics, funny AI chatter and on top of all endless fun due to a level design and share possibility for all player!

Valve totally handled turning it into a real game, not just a pack of levels for testing their portal mechanic. There are enough drama, plot twists and hilarious dialogs to call it a good story and for the first time in the dilogy I could feel a real scale of the facility we are in. 

Also, GLaDOS is the best girl, no doubt.

Awesome game putting it's own unique twist on physics-based puzzles, with a story and cast that's funny, yet engaging. I really enjoyed the different strings of dialogue between the characters GLaDOS and Wheatley, and the characters felt way more fleshed out than the characters in the previous iteration, and Wheatley is my personal favorite of the cast due to how funny he is (which might have been helped by the fact he was voiced by Stephen Merchant). All in all, great game 10/10, would recommend.
